entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
